description: A sample signer extension for the @polkadot/api
author: Jaco Greeff <jacogr@gmail.com>

scripts.build:zip: (rm -rf ./master-build.zip && yarn build && cd packages/extension/build && zip -r -FS ../../../master-build.zip *) && (rm -rf ./master-src.zip && zip -r -x '*build*' -x '*node_modules*' -FS ./master-src.zip packages .babelrc.js .editorconfig .eslintignore .eslintrc.js babel.config.js CHANGELOG.md CONTRIBUTING.md jest.config.js lerna.json LICENSE package.json README.md tsconfig.json yarn.lock)
